meanings.sent1: I had to resoldered the wire to fix the connection.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic resoldered the broken circuit board.
meanings.sent3: After the robot's arm fell off, it was resoldered back on.
meanings.sent4: She resoldered their friendship by apologizing.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully resoldered the delicate jewelry piece.

meanings.definition: To join or mend with solder again
meanings.sent1: He resoldered the pipe to stop the leak.
meanings.sent2: The plumber resoldered the joint to make it secure.
meanings.sent3: The knight resoldered his sword before heading into battle.
meanings.sent4: She resoldered the broken necklace, making it good as new.
meanings.sent5: The handyman resoldered the metal bracket to reinforce it.
